name: Car Soccer League
description:
Experience football like never before!

Become the master driver on the soccer field.

This game is combination of a football and a racing game, you will use your car to kick the ball into the goal. Jump, tackle and shoot using your vehicle!

Car Soccer League - Rocket car football! differs greatly from normal soccer games like PES or FIFA as you must use your driving and racing skills as well as your soccer skills.

If you've been looking for a mobile car soccer game, rev up your engines and get on the pitch for some pure football action
